title: Spotify tests swipe-to-queue gesture on Android a year after saying the feature isn’t ‘on our radar’
content:
It’s not uncommon for Android and iOS versions of the same basic app to have some different features, but Spotify has a long list of basic features that are only in the iOS version. Now, after many users have requested the function on Android, Spotify is testing out a “swipe to queue” feature for its Android app.

more…

The post Spotify tests swipe-to-queue gesture on Android a year after saying the feature isn’t ‘on our radar’ appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Spotify has supported a swipe-to-queue gesture on iOS for the better part of a decade, but now the feature is finally coming to Android.
